languages.text: "Утверждение энигматично. Запрашиваю расширенное толкование". {n}Паскаль требовательно заглядывает в глаза Авелю, но тот отворачивается.{/n}
"This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Утверждение энигматично. Запрашиваю расширенное толкование". {n}Паскаль требовательно заглядывает в глаза Авелю, но тот отворачивается.{/n}

languages.text: 「その発言は不可解だ。さらなる説明を要求する」{n}パスカルは手厳しくアベルの目をのぞき込むが、アベルは顔をそむける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は不可解だ。さらなる説明を要求する」{n}パスカルは手厳しくアベルの目をのぞき込むが、アベルは顔をそむける。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法难以理解。我要求进一步解释。”{n}帕斯卡探询地看着亚伯的双眼，但亚伯转过了身。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法难以理解。我要求进一步解释。”{n}帕斯卡探询地看着亚伯的双眼，但亚伯转过了身。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est énigmatique. Je requiers une interprétation plus détaillée, » {n}exige Pasqal en fixant son technoconfrère droit dans les yeux, mais Abel détourne le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est énigmatique. Je requiers une interprétation plus détaillée, » {n}exige Pasqal en fixant son technoconfrère droit dans les yeux, mais Abel détourne le regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es enigmática. Solicito una explicación desarrollada». {n}Pasqal mira a Abel a los ojos con expresión desafiante, pero luego se aparta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es enigmática. Solicito una explicación desarrollada». {n}Pasqal mira a Abel a los ojos con expresión desafiante, pero luego se aparta.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist enigmatisch. Ich verlange eine erweiterte Auslegung." {n}Pasqal blickt fordernd in Abels Augen, doch dieser wendet sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist enigmatisch. Ich verlange eine erweiterte Auslegung." {n}Pasqal blickt fordernd in Abels Augen, doch dieser wendet sich ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme esrarlı. Daha detaylı bir yorum talep ediyorum." {n}Pasqal, talepkârca Abel'in gözlerine bakıyor. Abel ise gözlerini çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is enigmatic. I request an expanded interpretation." {n}Pasqal looks demandingly into Abel's eyes, but he turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme esrarlı. Genişletilmiş bir yorum talep ediyorum." {n}Pasqal talepkâr bir şekilde Abel'in gözlerine bakıyor ama o, gözlerini çeviriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
